function_category: Scoring with Machine Learning Engine Models
short_description: This function gives a predict label for each input sample according to the pre-trained model table.
long_description: This function predicts input samples for sparse input format.  The model is trained by SparseSvmTrainer, and it is used to give one or more  predicts according with the confidence for each sample.

input_tables.name: Model
input_tables.rDescription: The model table generated by SVMTrainer.
input_tables.description: The model table generated by SVMTrainer.

argument_clauses.name: AttributeNameColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the sample_table column that contains the attributes of the test samples.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the sample_table column that contains the attributes of the test samples.

argument_clauses.name: IDColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the sample_table column that contains the identifiers of the test samples. The sample_table must be partitioned by this column.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the sample_table column that contains the identifiers of the test samples. The sample_table must be partitioned by this column.

argument_clauses.name: AttributeValueColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the sample_table column that contains the attribute values. By default, each attribute has the value 1.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the sample_table column that contains the attribute values. By default, each attribute has the value 1.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the sample_table columns to copy to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the sample_table columns to copy to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: OutputClassNum
argument_clauses.rDescription: Valid only for multiple-class models. Specifies the number of class labels to appear in the output table, with its corresponding prediction confidence. The default value is 1.
argument_clauses.description: Valid only for multiple-class models. Specifies the number of class labels to appear in the output table, with its corresponding prediction confidence. The default value is 1.
